query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS iot_maintenance_predictions (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  model_id INT NOT NULL,
  device_id INT NOT NULL,
  prediction_type ENUM('failure','maintenance_needed','health_decline','anomaly','remaining_life') NOT NULL,
  predicted_date TIMESTAMP NULL,
  predicted_value DECIMAL(10,4),
  confidence_score DECIMAL(5,4) NOT NULL,
  severity ENUM('low','medium','high','critical') DEFAULT 'medium',
  current_health_score DECIMAL(5,2),
  predicted_health_score DECIMAL(5,2),
  days_until_maintenance INT,
  contributing_factors JSON,
  recommended_actions JSON,
  llm_analysis TEXT,
  status ENUM('active','acknowledged','scheduled','resolved','expired') DEFAULT 'active',
  acknowledged_by INT,
  acknowledged_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  scheduled_maintenance_id INT,
  resolved_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  actual_outcome TEXT,
  was_accurate INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_pred_model (model_id),
  INDEX idx_pred_device (device_id),
  INDEX idx_pred_type (prediction_type),
  INDEX idx_pred_status (status),
  INDEX idx_pred_severity (severity),
  INDEX idx_pred_date (predicted_date)
);

  device_id INT NOT NULL,

  predicted_date TIMESTAMP NULL,
  predicted_value DECIMAL(10,4),
  confidence_score DECIMAL(5,4) NOT NULL,
  severity ENUM('low','medium','high','critical') DEFAULT 'medium',
  current_health_score DECIMAL(5,2),
  predicted_health_score DECIMAL(5,2),
  days_until_maintenance INT,
  contributing_factors JSON,
  recommended_actions JSON,
  llm_analysis TEXT,
  status ENUM('active','acknowledged','scheduled','resolved','expired') DEFAULT 'active',
  acknowledged_by INT,
  acknowledged_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  scheduled_maintenance_id INT,
  resolved_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  actual_outcome TEXT,
  was_accurate INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_pred_model (model_id),
  INDEX idx_pred_device (device_id),
  INDEX idx_pred_type (prediction_type),
  INDEX idx_pred_status (status),
  INDEX idx_pred_severity (severity),
  INDEX idx_pred_date (predicted_date)
);
